title: Multimedia-Based Character Exploration Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Mathematical Concepts and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Experimental environment combining mathematical problem-solving skills with character development elements for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Learners can independently design and implement mathematical inquiry questions using multimedia tools
Learners can apply character traits such as responsibility, fairness, and critical thinking during collaborative processes
Learners can communicate inquiry results by converting them into visual and auditory multimedia materials
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
